hive > Hive 2 Regex SerDe

Testing hive 2.10 regex serde

author @regular.express

Image on regexpress/hive

properties

  • * string input.regex
    Regex string.
  • * string columns
    Whitepsace seperated column list.
  • * string columns.types
    Comma seperated column type list.
  • boolean input.regex.case.insensitive
    Determine regex case insensitive.

Sharings

  • Phone Number Regex

    regex
    > hive2.10-serde # phone # number # hive
    • input.regex (0[0-9]{2})-([0-9]{3,4})-([0-9]{3,4})
    • columns A,B,C
    • columns.types STRING,STRING,STRING
    Sokcuri
    2016-11-23 21:36:11
